column4: hi, i'm having problems with my login screen. i'm on ubuntu 9.10 and i have a login screen from xubuntu, and i cant change it! Can you help me please?
same thing just happened to me! let's find out why

Dr_Willis, Tartaros  in fact, is just like another usplash screen, blue, with XUBUNTU writed. i have the package xubuntu-gdm-theme installed, but, if i try to remove, synaptic tells me that he have to remove ubuntu-desktop and xsplash

Dr_Willis, Tartaros i decided to uninstall xubuntu-gdm-theme and then reinstall ubuntu-desktop and xsplash. It worked, i dont have the xubuntu splash screen anymore. But i have another problem. (just a note, i installed epidermis, changed some things but i get no result:S) my big problem now is that since i upgraded to karmic, my start-up is slower. it spent more than 40seconds, after the grub menu
ok, il try to remove and install the packages you did, and then reboot. my boottime is also considerably longer than before upgrade!
ok, good luck, it's strange, the thing about boot time...
